Module com.example.battleship
Package com.example.battleship.models

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
com.example.battleship.models.Ship
public class Ship extends Object
Represents a ship in the Battleship game. Manages the ship's position, orientation, and interactions with the game board.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Ship(int longitud)
    Creates a new Ship with the specified length.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ship

      public Ship(int longitud)
      Creates a new Ship with the specified length. The ship is horizontal by default and starts at position (0, 0).
      Parameters:
      longitud - The length of the ship.

  • Method Details

    • rotar

      public void rotar()
      Rotates the ship, changing its orientation between horizontal and vertical.

    • isHorizontal

      public boolean isHorizontal()
      Checks if the ship is oriented horizontally.
      Returns:
      true if the ship is horizontal, false otherwise.

    • getLongitud

      public int getLongitud()
      Returns the length of the ship.
      Returns:
      The length of the ship.

    • setPosicion

      public void setPosicion(int x, int y)
      Sets the position of the ship on the board.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the ship's position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the ship's position.

    • getPosX

      public int getPosX()
      Returns the x-coordinate of the ship's position.
      Returns:
      The x-coordinate.

    • getPosY

      public int getPosY()
      Returns the y-coordinate of the ship's position.
      Returns:
      The y-coordinate.

    • cabeEnTablero

      public boolean cabeEnTablero(int tableroTamano)
      Checks if the ship fits within the board limits at its current position.
      Parameters:
      tableroTamano - The size of the board.
      Returns:
      true if the ship fits, false otherwise.

    • validarPosicion

      public boolean validarPosicion(int x, int y, boolean[][] tablero)
      Validates if the ship can be placed at the specified position without overlapping other ships.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the position to validate.
      y - The y-coordinate of the position to validate.
      tablero - The game board represented as a boolean matrix.
      Returns:
      true if the position is valid, false otherwise.

    • ocuparPosicionEnTablero

      public void ocuparPosicionEnTablero(boolean[][] tablero)
      Marks the positions occupied by the ship on the board.
      Parameters:
      tablero - The game board represented as a boolean matrix.

    • liberarPosicionEnTablero

      public void liberarPosicionEnTablero(boolean[][] tablero)
      Clears the positions currently occupied by the ship on the board.
      Parameters:
      tablero - The game board represented as a boolean matrix.
